item.title: AL: 3. Recursion
item.description: In this chapter, I learned about recursion, which is very useful in many algorithms. Also, this chapter shows us how to break down a problem into a base case and a recursive case. 1. Recursion If you have a box containing more boxes, in which there will be no or more boxes. The key is in one of the boxes. How can you do to search for the key?
